attributes.comment:
Document ID USCIS-2006-0044-0001

I am distressed to learn that the fees for adoption are increasing @ 140%. We
hope to start our second adoption this summer, and the thought of having to pay
not only for this increase once - but most likely twice as the length of time to
adopt from China has lengthened since our first adoption in Sept 2005.

Won't you consider raising the initial fee- but imposing a lower fee for those of us
that have to renew fingerprints and petitions once the 18 months expire????

Thank you for your time and consideration. Nancy and Kevin Murphy
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nancy Murphy
